title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Floral Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Finely crafted with shimmering White Gold
embellished with brilliant-cut Diamonds and vibrant
pear-shaped Emeralds. The diamonds boast exceptional fire and clarity. Featuring natural Emeralds with deep color saturation. Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This breathtaking necklace showcases an elaborate floral motif, meticulously crafted with dazzling diamonds. The design features stylized flowers and leaves set in a flowing arrangement. Exquisite detailing with pave-set diamonds enhancing the beauty of the emeralds. The central drop-shaped emeralds add a touch of regality and sophistication.
colors: Emerald Green and Sparkling White (Diamonds). A classic and elegant combination.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Equally stunning for upscale modern events.
description: A true statement piece, this Emerald and Diamond Haaram is a timeless treasure. The meticulously crafted design, the brilliance of the diamonds, and the vibrant hue of the emeralds create a captivating allure. This necklace embodies elegance, sophistication, and enduring value, making it a prized addition to any jewelry collection. Its the perfect piece for any Bride and Bridesmaid.
